DOC.brief_summary: Antipsychotic drug effective treat positive symptom schizophrenia ; however efficacy treat negative symptom limit . This study want evaluate efficacy selegiline augmentation antipsychotic medication treat negative symptom inpatient chronic schizophrenia . With randomized clinical trial two group patient select receive selegiline placebo . Primary end point decrease negative symptom case group . Inclusion criterion : 1- Patients moderate severe negative symptom 2- Patients least one year antipsychotic drug therapy , current dose > = 1 month . 3- No psychotropic drug past month . Exclusion criterion : 1- Severe major depressive disorder , substance abuse , severe positive symptom schizophrenia , Treatment MDD antidepressant drug past month .
